com.dragonboatrace.game.entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dragonboatrace.game.entities.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Background, Boat, LaneMarker, Obstacle, PowerUp

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a generic entity.
    Author:
    Jacob Turner

              float weight)
        Creates a new entity where the initial velocity is not 0, but instead the given value.
        Parameters:
        pos - The initial position of the entity.
        vel - The velocity to start the entity at.
        size - The size of the entity.
        weight - The weight of the entity.

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getRelPos(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 relPos)
        Gives the position of an entity compared to a given vector. Only affects the y-position.
        Parameters:
        relPos - The other vector being compared to.
        Returns:
        The relative position to relPos.
